Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO ENERGY AND TELECOMMUNICATIONS

Title: Enacts the "bucks for boilers act"
Summary: Enacts the bucks for boilers act, which creates a program to aid in transition of housing units to electric heat pumps and other high energy efficiency upgrades.
LawCode: Add §1885, amd §1854, Pub Auth L; add §99-ss, St Fin L; amd §11-104, Energy L; amd §378, Exec L; amd §224-f, Lab L; amd §10-b, Emerg Ten Prot Act of 1974
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, the state finance law, the energy law, the executive law, the labor law and the emergency tenant protection act of nineteen seventy-four, in relation to enacting the "bucks for boilers act"
